name: Jump Like a Grad Student
description:
For 20 years, Smith remained a perpetual grad student, unable to secure his doctoral degree. He suffered at the hands of a ruthless professor, ultimately losing his money, youth, and very essence of life.

Yet, a rumor from an island – of the existence of room-temperature superconductors – offers him the last glimmer of hope for that elusive doctorate.

You must ascend to the island's peak, no matter the cost.

"Jump Like a Grad Student."





A treacherous journey lies ahead to the summit of the island.
Overcome numerous traps and obstacles in your path.
Show the relentless passion of a grad student who never gives up!
